price: Onima koji vjeruju i čine dobra djela - blago njima, njih čeka divno prebivalište.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ طُوبَىٰ لَهُمۡ وَحُسۡنُ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ṭūbā lahum waḥus'nu maābin
